title: üåæ SmartFarm Advisor
about: SmartFarm Advisor is an intelligent farming assistant designed for African smallholder farmers. It leverages AI to detect plant diseases, provide agricultural advice, and offer localized weather insights, helping farmers make data-driven decisions to improve crop yields.
seoDescription: AI-powered farming assistant for African smallholders. Detect plant diseases, get advisory, and weather insights to improve crop yields.

features.title: Disease Detection
features.desc: Instant identification of plant diseases from leaf scans using computer vision.

features.title: AI Advisory
features.desc: Personalized agricultural advice based on local crop conditions.

features.title: Weather Insights
features.desc: Localized weather forecasts and farming alerts.

features.title: Mobile-First
features.desc: Optimized for low-bandwidth environments common in rural areas.

title: Commerce OS üöÄ
about: Commerce OS is a multi-tenant conversational commerce platform built for WhatsApp, leveraging the power of Genkit AI and seamless M-Pesa integration. It's designed to empower modern African merchants by scaling their businesses through AI-driven conversational commerce.
seoDescription: Multi-tenant conversational commerce platform for WhatsApp with Genkit AI and M-Pesa integration, empowering African merchants.

features.title: AI Sales Agent
features.desc: Natural language product search and personalized recommendations.

features.title: Interactive Cart
features.desc: Multi-item cart management via WhatsApp interactive buttons.

features.title: Payment Flexibility
features.desc: Support for M-Pesa STK Push and Cash on Delivery (COD).

features.title: Merchant Pro Tools
features.desc: Dedicated AI agent for merchant onboarding and store management.

title: üíÜ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Acute Spa and Salon
about: Acute Spa and Salon is a modern, responsive web application designed for a premier beauty and wellness business. Built with Vite and React, it offers a seamless and luxurious user experience, reflecting the high-quality services provided by the salon.
seoDescription: Modern, responsive spa and salon booking website built with React and Vite, featuring elegant UI and WhatsApp scheduling.

features.title: Modern UI
features.desc: Elegant and calming design built with shadcn/ui components.

features.title: Fully Responsive
features.desc: Optimized for all devices, from mobile to desktop.

features.title: Booking Integration
features.desc: Easy appointment scheduling via WhatsApp.

features.title: Fast Performance
features.desc: Leveraging Vite's build system for lightning-fast load times.

title: üë®‚Äçüíª AkiTech Solutions
about: AkiTech Solutions is a startup brand offering custom software solutions. This project showcases a modern, professional, and SEO-optimized website built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. It serves as a digital storefront for the brand's services and portfolio.
seoDescription: Custom software solutions startup website built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Professional, SEO-optimized digital storefront.

features.title: Professional Design
features.desc: Modern and responsive layout focused on corporate branding.

features.title: Dynamic Themes
features.desc: Support for dark and light mode for better user preference.

features.title: SEO Optimized
features.desc: Built with best practices to ensure high visibility on search engines.

features.title: Next.js Power
features.desc: Fast performance and server-side rendering for optimal speed.

title: üèéÔ∏è AutoParts Hub
about: AutoParts Hub is a comprehensive inventory management system for automobile parts. It provides business owners with a powerful dashboard to track stock levels, manage orders, and organize products by categories, ensuring an efficient and streamlined supply chain.
seoDescription: Comprehensive automobile parts inventory management system with real-time tracking, order management, and smart analytics.

features.title: Inventory Tracking
features.desc: Real-time monitoring of stock levels and low-stock alerts.

features.title: Category Management
features.desc: Organized product categorization for easy navigation and search.

features.title: Order Management
features.desc: Streamlined process for handling incoming and outgoing parts orders.

features.title: Smart Analytics
features.desc: Data-driven insights into sales performance and inventory turnover.
